definition: to wind around/to wrap round/to coil/tangle/to involve/to bother/to annoy

sentences.english: A thousand ills the aged world surround.
sentences.chinese: 老年的世界千種病痛纏擾。

sentences.english: The hostages were obsessed by the fear of death.
sentences.chinese: 人質被死亡的恐懼所纏擾。

sentences.english: In fact, he's becoming something of an oped stalker.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，他成爲一個論壇版纏擾的東西。

sentences.english: He feared the soul of his deceased wife would haunt him.
sentences.chinese: 他懼怕亡妻的幽靈會來纏擾他。
